pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller

Class BookController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.mazur.simpleabclibrary.controller.BookController

  • @Controller
 @Scope(value="session")
 @RequestMapping(value="/book")
 @PropertySource(value="classpath:systemMessages.properties") @PropertySource(value="classpath:library-configuration.properties")
public class BookController
extends Object
    The controller class is used to return the view depending on the user request. This controller contains the views of:
    • "main-bookstore"
    • "add-book-form"
    • "confirm-book-page"
    • "book-update book-details"


    This controller also perform the actions on the books.
    Author:
    Marcin Mazur

      Returns the view of "main-bookstore" with model attributes:
      userReservationsCount - The number of user reservations startResult - The value of first index of the results amountOfResults - The number of total results showMoreLinkValue - The value of the "showMoreLink" resultRange - The description of pagination showLessLinkValue - The value of the "showLessLink" booksList - The list of the books userAccessLevel - The access level of the user systemMessage - The system message

    • Method Detail

      • showMainBookstore

        @RequestMapping(value="/main-bookstore")
public String showMainBookstore(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                          org.springframework.ui.Model theModel,
                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="title")
                                                                          String title,
                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="author")
                                                                          String author,
                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="publisher")
                                                                          String publisher,
                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="isbn")
                                                                          String isbn,
                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="id")
                                                                          String bookId,
                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="systemMessage")
                                                                          String systemMessage,
                                                                          @RequestParam(required=false,name="startResult")
                                                                          Integer startResult)
        Returns the view of "main-bookstore" with model attributes:
        • userReservationsCount - The number of user reservations
        • startResult - The value of first index of the results
        • amountOfResults - The number of total results
        • showMoreLinkValue - The value of the "showMoreLink"
        • resultRange - The description of pagination
        • showLessLinkValue - The value of the "showLessLink"
        • booksList - The list of the books
        • userAccessLevel - The access level of the user
        • systemMessage - The system message
        Parameters:
        request - The HttpServletRequest containing the HttpSession
        theModel - The Model containing the data passed to the view
        title - The String containing the title
        author - The String containing the author
        publisher - The String containing the publisher
        isbn - The String containing the ISBN
        bookId - The String containing the id of the book
        systemMessage - The String containing the system message
        startResult - The Integer containing the value of first index of the results
        Returns:
        The String representing the name of the view

      • generateAndDownloadBookLabel

        @RequestMapping(value="/generate-book-label")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<org.springframework.core.io.InputStreamResource> generateAndDownloadBookLabel(@RequestParam(value="bookId")
                                                                                                                                                                            int bookId,
                                                                                                                                                                            javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                                                                                                                     throws com.itextpdf.text.BadElementException,
                                                                                                                                                                            MalformedURLException,
                                                                                                                                                                            IOException
        Returns the label of the book as a PDF File
        Parameters:
        bookId - The int containing the id of the book
        request - The HttpServletRequest containing the HttpSession
        Returns:
        A File representing the label of the book
        Throws:
        IOException - A IOException is thrown when the file can't be created
        MalformedURLException - A MalformedURLException is thrown when URL is incorrect
        com.itextpdf.text.BadElementException - A BadElementException is thrown when created element has incorrect form.
